Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
